name: The Pioneer Backpack
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "The Pioneer Backpack" "152039" #L "Screwdriver" "150922" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Screwdriver + The Pioneer Backpack = #L "The Pioneer Backpack (Modified Version)" "156831" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ You can switch it back to the normal version using the Screwdriver on it again.
